ISSUE.TITLE: build on Ubuntu is failing occasionally
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: sometimes build is failing on Ubuntu, here it is an example: https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/actions/runs/7862582347/job/21452217647?pr=15305#step:6:27 ``` fail: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.ExceptionHandlerMiddleware[1] An unhandled exception has occurred while executing the request. System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: PartName at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.TryInsert(TKey key, TValue value, InsertionBehavior behavior) at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.Add(TKey key, TValue value) at OrchardCore.ContentManagement.GraphQL.FieldTypeExtensions.WithMetaData(FieldType fieldType, String name, Object value) in /_/src/OrchardCore/OrchardCore.ContentManagement.GraphQL/Extensions/FieldTypeExtensions.cs:line [26](https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/actions/runs/7862582347/job/21452217647?pr=15305#step:6:27) ```
